refnamediv.refpurpose: Module for configuring the Rivendell Radio Automation System

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The rdadmin1 module is used to manage the configuration of the Rivendell Radio Automation System. When started with no arguments, it will prompt for the credentials of a Rivendell user that has the Administer System or Administer RSS Feeds permissions. If authentication of those credentials is successful, it will then display the main rdadmin1 button menu.

If invoked by a system user with an effective user id of 0 --i.e. "root" -- and the --add-host-entry option is specified, rdadmin1 will bypass the login process and prompt the user to create a new host entry for the local system, following which it will exit.
For documentation of the GUI elements of rdadmin1, see the Rivendell Administration section of the Rivendell Operations Guide.
